talk.chat:
Guard Bret:
Having the border so close to the capital city makes me very nervous. Things have quited down now, but if Elmore were tp attack I fear that the border guards would not be able to resist at all. There was talk for a while of opening the border entirely, but now they seem to be on a higher level of alert than ever before. I pray that nothing triggers the resumption of hostilities...
"What is on the other side of the border?"
Ask about the local lord and tax rate.
Quest

Guard Bret:
Nothing more than the Goddard territory of Elmore. There's a settlement I know there called Goddard Village, extremely impoverished since the war. While his citizens starve Elmore still plans another attack upon Aden. He has raised huge offensive castles! I pity the people that live there...
After the war, the situation in Aden was also bleak, but thanks to the ingenuity of His Royal Highness Amadeo, we have recovered nicely. My lord is younger than I am, and really quite amazing...
Go back
